titles.title: A resolution urging the Government of Moldova to ensure a fair and democratic election process for the parliamentary elections on April 5, 2009.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

calendar.text: Committee on Foreign Relations. Ordered to be reported favorably.

action.text: Committee on Foreign Relations. Reported by Senator Kerry without amendment and with a preamble. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 42.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Rule of law and government transparency
Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary: 4/1/2009--Passed Senate without amendment. Reaffirms the beneficial relationship that exists between the United States and Moldova. Recognizes that Moldova's development of a democratic political system is a precondition for full integration into the Western community of nations and the provision of assistance necessary to attain such integration. Urges the government of Moldova to meet its commitments to the Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe.
